sub_title: Solution Sales Lead | Microsoft Technologies | Driving Transformative Customer Engagements | Global Business Development | Accenture Europe
summary:
I'm a results-driven Sales and Solutions specialist with extensive global experience in unlocking untapped business opportunities and converting them into successful commercial ventures. 

My journey has been fueled by a passion for continuous learning, pushing boundaries, and crafting strategies that align with customer goals. As a Sales Lead, Enterprise Solution Architect and Account Manager, I've honed my skills and expertise across various domains, including Cloud, Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, Intelligent Automation, and Business Applications.

Operating from diverse locations worldwide, including the USA, Canada, Brazil, France, Belgium, Netherlands, & India, I've found inspiration in discovering innovative approaches to elevate tech capacity and deliver value to customers.

Certified as an Enterprise Solution Architect and holding 30 Microsoft certifications, I take immense pride in leading by example and fostering collaborative environments that drive positive transformation.

I'm committed to advocating equal opportunities for all demographics and devising elegant solutions that enhance governance within organizations. Emphasizing inclusion and diversity, I believe in a sustainable future for generations to come.

My pursuit of self-development has equipped me with a versatile skill set, enabling me to exceed industry expectations across sectors like Products, Resources, Finance, Client Media & Entertainment and Health & Public Sector. 

Let's connect and explore synergies! I'm excited to network with fellow industry professionals and embark on meaningful collaborations. 

Feel free to reach out. I welcome new connections!

NiTiN Dhawan

awards.title: ALWAYS DO THE RIGHT  THING
awards.description: ts that time of the year where I wanted to take a moment to express my heartfelt gratitude for all that you have done, all that you do, and all that you continue to do. Your dedication, hard work, and unwavering commitment never cease to amaze me. I truly appreciate you for being your exceptional self and consistently bringing immense value to everything you touch. Your contributions have made a significant difference, and I am incredibly thankful to have you as part of our team. Here's to your continued success and the positive impact you make and I am looking forward to partnering with you in FY24 and beyond!

profile_positions.description:
In my present role, I am primarily responsible for overseeing all aspects of intricate sales cycles. My goal is to assist customers in revolutionizing customer interactions by integrating various Microsoft Hybrid solutions. 

I take the lead in orchestrating and guiding strategic endeavors within the Market Wide Europe Product Client Group. My focus centers on key industries including CPG.AI, Retail, Industrial, Automotive, and Life Science.

Additionally, I am tasked with supervising a virtual sales team and overseeing the development of compelling business cases. This ensures the delivery of tailored value propositions that cater to specific industries.

I analyze metrics related to sales performance and provide regular updates to senior management, contributing to informed executive decision-making.

I leverage data-driven insights to refine sales processes and identify areas for enhancement. Alongside this, I establish and nurture crucial relationships with stakeholders while championing the implementation of strategic initiatives. These initiatives are aimed at boosting sales and cultivating revenue-centric Key Performance Indicators (KPIs).

Noteworthy Accomplishments:
• Elevated to the position of Sales Origination Associate Director in December 2023, transitioning from the role of Sales Origination Senior Manager. This promotion was granted due to consistently surpassing performance expectations.
profile_positions.title: Sales Origination Associate Director (Sales Lead for Europe)

profile_positions.description:
Within this parallel function, I assume responsibility for overseeing Market Wide Europe Apps and Infrastructure operations across the expansive European market. My role involves advocating for the Apps & Infra industry, drawing attention to intricate sales and solution cycles that facilitate transformative customer interactions through an extensive array of Microsoft Hybrid solutions.

I am actively engaged in formulating and executing deal strategies, crafting compelling business cases, complex solutions and guiding virtual sales teams. Together, we deliver value propositions tailored to specific industries while ensuring utmost client satisfaction. 

I am dedicated to fostering essential relationships with stakeholders and driving the implementation of strategic initiatives that drive sales growth. Concurrently, I am involved in the formulation and delivery of revenue-centric Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) that quantifiably reflect the impact of our endeavors.

Furthermore, I play a vital role in the collaborative Accenture-Microsoft  pipeline. I steer the GTM Campaign for Turbo Charged Azure Migration, which encompasses the Journey to/within Cloud, Legacy Modernization, SAP on Azure, Data & AI, Business Applications, and the Microsoft 365 suite.

Noteworthy Accomplishments:
• Cultivated and nurtured strong relations with European GEOS and Microsoft Sales Pursuit Team, leading to impactful outcomes and strengthened partnerships.
profile_positions.title: Sales Origination Senior Manager (Sales Lead for Apps & Infra, Europe)

profile_positions.description:
During this timeframe, I made a transition from France to Netherlands.

In my role as an Enterprise Solution Architect, I was recognized and tasked by senior management to drive System Integration / Application Outsourcing / Infrastructure Outsourcing  / Infrastructure Consulting deals. Moreover, I governed end-to-end sales and solution processes while supporting/nurturing customer relation. 

In addition to contributing to Avanade Sales Team for 5+ years, I nurtured Gallia (France, Belgium, and Netherlands) as a single point of contact, overseeing ATC (Advanced Technology Centers - Offshore and Nearshore) operations. 

Finally, I managed designated accounts and defined strategies according to specified customer goals while maintaining alignment across Client Group and Solution Areas within Gallia.

Proudest Achievements:
• Excelled as the Single Point of Contact for Gallia Solution/ATC liaison, driving seamless collaboration and fostering remarkable operational efficiency.
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager (Enterprise Solutions Architect & ATC Liaison)

profile_positions.description:
In my prior position, I held the mandate of crafting and upholding an enterprise architectural roadmap. This involved identifying opportunities for innovation and evolution to facilitate company growth and align with dynamic market demands.

In this period. I coordinated end-to-end complex sales cycles to drive the transformation of clients’ customer engagement through a combination of Microsoft solutions. I worked for Avanade Sales Team looking after Gallia (France, Belgium, and Netherlands) as a single point of contact for all ATC (Advanced Technology Centers) operations. 

I was successfully transitioned from a role in France to the Netherlands in September 2019 while maintaining my position as the Gallia Lead for ATC Operations, demonstrating adaptability and seamless cross-border operational leadership.

Furthermore, I managed key accounts and defined strategies to meet specified customer goals while maintaining alignment across Client Group and Solutions Areas within Gallia. 

In addition to conducting appraisals and devising personal development plans to review progress and maintain alignment with enterprise goals of the virtual sales team. I compiled supporting technical documentation including presentations while nurturing stakeholder relations to pinpoint and mitigate any issues or potential concerns. 

Selected Achievements:
• Promoted to Senior Manager role from Manager in December 2018 for exceeding performance expectations.
• Served as Single point of contact for Gallia Solution (France, Belgium, Netherlands & Luxembourg) / ATC liaison (India & Philippines etc.)
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager (Solution Architect & ATC Liaison)

profile_positions.description:
During this timeframe, I made a transition from India to France.

As Manager, I orchestrated comprehensive sales cycles aimed at driving the metamorphosis of clients' customer engagement by leveraging a fusion of Microsoft solutions. I initiated this journey in France and progressively expanded my reach to encompass the entirety of Gallia (France, Belgium, and Netherlands). In addition, I assumed the role of ATC Liaison for overseeing all operations within the Advanced Technology Centers.

In parallel, I effectively managed pivotal accounts and formulated strategies tailored to achieving specified customer objectives. This involved ensuring coherence across Client Groups and Solutions Areas within Gallia.

My responsibilities extended to attending significant business reviews and meetings, delegating tasks, providing revenue-driven Key Performance Indicators (KPIs), conceiving and executing sales and deal strategies, creating compelling business cases, and exercising tactical control over project budgets and timelines. This was essential to steer teams toward adherence to objectives and the attainment of scheduled targets.

In a supervisory capacity, I guided a virtual sales team, guaranteeing the delivery of industry-specific value propositions and bolstering customer satisfaction.

Proudest Achievement:
• Garnered recognition from French management, entrusted with the prestigious role of driving SI/AO/IO/IC deals. Directed all aspects of the comprehensive spectrum of sales and solution processes, skillfully fortifying and nurturing customer relationships in the process.
profile_positions.title: Manager (Solution Architect)

profile_positions.description:
In this period, I made a transition from a delivery role to Pre-Sales. I commenced my journey as a Solution Architect, catering to diverse customers in regions such as the USA and Europe, spanning various solution areas, all managed remotely from India.

Key Achievements:
• Elevated to the role of Manager in December 2015, progressing from the position of Associate Manager. This promotion was in recognition of consistently surpassing performance expectations.
profile_positions.title: Manager (Delivery Manager & Solution Architect)

profile_positions.description:
During this timeframe, I made a transition from India to Brazil.

In this capacity, I undertook the dual role of Project Manager (PM) and Technical Lead, leading Managed Delivery and Development Services Engagements. My responsibilities encompassed activities for major customers from Brazil, Mauritius and USA.

I provided invaluable technical guidance and mentorship in the development of applications for CRM and ERP domains. This involved leveraging technologies such as MS Dynamics CRM, AX, and MS .Net Technologies.

A pivotal aspect of my role involved orchestrating change control processes and ensuring the endorsement of Phase Deliverables and release entry/exit criteria.

Additionally, I was instrumental in fostering technical excellence, ensuring the delivery of top-notch applications that met the high standards expected by our esteemed clientele.

Key Accomplishments:
• Successfully delivered numerous large-scale engagements, showcasing the ability to navigate complex projects to fruition.
• Served significant clients in Brazil, notably CIELO, contributing to their strategic technological advancements.
profile_positions.title: Associate Manager (Project Manager / Technical Lead)

profile_positions.description:
During this timeframe, I made a transition from India to Canada.

I assumed the pivotal roles of an Architect and Technical Lead within the scope of Managed Delivery and Development Services Engagements. These responsibilities were executed while being stationed in Toronto, Canada, where I engaged with on-site clients, notably CIBC Bank and Microsoft, for MS Dynamics CRM & AX Implementations.
profile_positions.title: Associate Manager (Architect)

profile_positions.description:
In this Technical Lead position, I played a crucial role in the Managed Delivery and Development Services Engagement. My expertise was focused on application development within CRM and ERP domains, utilizing technologies like MS Dynamics CRM, AX, and MS .Net Technologies. 

Among my key responsibilities were Client Relationship Management, creating comprehensive Master project plans, resource and schedule planning, client coordination, overseeing Project Artifacts, developing Risk Mitigation plans, orchestrating Change Control processes, ensuring sign-off on Phase Deliverables, managing Release Entry/Exit Criteria, preparing Estimates for requirements, and delivering specialized technical guidance.

I provided instrumental support to clients such as Halliburton and Avanade ATCI. In addition, I assumed the role of Capability Lead for Avanade ATCI (India), showcasing my leadership and proficiency in driving technological capabilities within the organization.
profile_positions.title: Team Lead (Technical Lead / Architect)

profile_positions.description:
During this period, I was stationed in Seattle for project assignments as a Module Lead, actively contributing to diverse facets of Delivery assignments focused on MS Dynamics CRM. I provided pivotal support to clients including MTC Microsoft US and Finra US.

This experience proved immensely enriching, allowing me to enhance my proficiency in customer relationship management (CRM) and delivery management. As a Technical Architect, I further honed my skills and expertise while successfully fulfilling the demands of these projects.
profile_positions.title: Module Lead

profile_positions.description: In this past position, I championed the execution of recommended technical solutions on Microsoft Dynamics CRM, spanning the European market. Provided dedicated support to customers including Microsoft and Intervet in the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description:
In this role, I conducted comprehensive code evaluations and led investigative research, leveraging my software development expertise to address project challenges. Actively engaged in design discussions and the advancement of framework development.

I skillfully resolved high-priority bugs and devised proficient development and maintenance strategies, effectively spanning all stages of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC).

A pivotal role involved contributing to a development team focused on the technical aspects within the Microsoft Stack for global projects.

I provided valuable support to diverse clients including Image Source UK, Software Additions Limited (UK), Delaplaine Creative California, and Bearak Reports Boston, among others.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
